Schema: {"typeName":"NewRelic::Observability::AlertsPolicy","description":"CRUD operations for New Relic Alerts Policies via the NerdGraph API","sourceUrl":"https://github.com/newrelic/newrelic-cloudformation-resource-providers-alertspolicy.git","tagging":{"taggable":false},"definitions":{"incidentPreferenceEnum":{"type":"string","enum":["PER_CONDITION","PER_CONDITION_AND_TARGET","PER_POLICY"]}},"properties":{"Name":{"type":"string"},"IncidentPreference":{"$ref":"#/definitions/incidentPreferenceEnum"},"Id":{"type":"string"},"ListQueryFilter":{"type":"string"},"Variables":{"type":"object","patternProperties":{"^[A-Za-z0-9]{1,64}$":{"type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":false}},"required":["Name","IncidentPreference"],"additionalProperties":false,"primaryIdentifier":["/properties/Id"],"readOnlyProperties":["/properties/Id"],"handlers":{"create":{"permissions":["cloudformation:BatchDescribeTypeConfigurations"]},"read":{"permissions":["cloudformation:BatchDescribeTypeConfigurations"]},"update":{"permissions":["cloudformation:BatchDescribeTypeConfigurations"]},"delete":{"permissions":["cloudformation:BatchDescribeTypeConfigurations"]},"list":{"permissions":["cloudformation:BatchDescribeTypeConfigurations"]}},"typeConfiguration":{"properties":{"Endpoint":{"type":"string","default":"https://api.newrelic.com/graphql"},"APIKey":{"type":"string"},"AccountID":{"type":"string"},"LogLevel":{"type":"string","default":"info"}},"additionalProperties":false,"required":["APIKey","AccountID"]}}
